column4: hello. :) I'm looking for some remote desktop help.  I have an ubuntu guru on the phone who I trust and both of us want him to get access to my desktop through a remote desktop viewer, but "remote desktop" doesn't work.  any ideas on how to do this?
yes. he is able to connect through SSH
what protocol do you try to use? you have vnc installed, or you use x forwarding or what?
